DOC.detailed_description: Fifty patient participate study ( 25 experimental group body adjustment protocol osteopathy 25 control group ) . For first objective study , patient determine osteopathic approach body adjustment approach improve low back pain ( Oswestry Questionnaire ) . For second aim , investigator want know change distribution body weight low limb group experimental control group , analyze stabilometric platform ( Footscan® ) . The experimental group treat osteopathy , three session ( 20 minutes/session ) frequency one session/week . The treatment osteopathic body adjustment protocol . In hand , control group make 2 stretch global posture week ( 10 minute posture ) three week : first anterior muscular chain second posture stretch posterior muscle chain . Before treatment , immediately last session month later , measure stabilometric parameter , height Oswestry . The analysis make Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS Statistics ) 22.0
